plot outline: Shrirang Deshmukh a teacher gets transferred to his village.Where he goes to live in his ancestral house which is taken care by his caretaker Ghatpande.But finds that his house has become a prime property and a builder Mehta wants him to sell it.Shrirang is wondering on how to tackle the situation he stumbles upon a book of his ancestors from last seven generations.The ancestors are only seen to him who are waiting for someone from Deshmukh family to liberate them to salvation.
title: Kho-Kho
plot: Shrirang returns to his palatial house in his village where he is haunted by his ancestors.

Shrirang Deshmukh a teacher gets transferred to his village.Where he goes to live in his ancestral house which is taken care by his caretaker Ghatpande.But finds that his house has become a prime property and a builder Mehta wants him to sell it.Shrirang is wondering on how to tackle the situation he stumbles upon a book of his ancestors from last seven generations.The ancestors are only seen to him who are waiting for someone from Deshmukh family to liberate them to salvation.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
